text: Neuburgia is a genus of plants in the family Loganiaceae. It contains the following species (but this list may be incomplete): * Neuburgia alata (A.C.Sm.) A.C.Smith * Neuburgia collina (A.C.Sm) A.C.Smith * Neuburgia macrocarpa (A.C.Sm.) A.C.Smith * Neuburgia macroloba (A.C.Sm.) A.C.Smith * Neuburgia tubiflora Bl. ==References== Category:Gentianales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Neuburgia
